metaface.interaction
Class LinkedState

java.lang.Object
  metaface.interaction.State
      metaface.interaction.LinkedState
public class LinkedState
extends State

This class provides a different type of DMTL State to cover linked entry actions

Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon Beard

matchStimulus

public BestList matchStimulus(InteractionContext ic,
                              Stack path,
                              BestList bestlist)
Performs a match on user stimulus such as natural language or a hypertext link

Overrides:
matchStimulus in class State
Parameters:
ic - The current context of the interaction
path - A stack denoting the path (within the DMTL file) to this state
bestlist - A list of the best matching states
Returns:
The modified list of best matching states
